page.title: 13Favourite Outside Games
page.content: Favourite games in our school are:- Hide and Seek 1.One person counts to 10 while the other people hide. 2.The person who has counted to 10 must try to find the others. Budge 1.One person has to touch the others while they are not standing on a drain cover. 2.Only one person is allowed on a drain cover. 3.If someone wishes to take over the drain cover they must say "budge" as they get to it. Baked Beans 1.One person is the caller. She calls a.Runner beans-everyone runs on the spot. b.Crocodile beans - everyone crawls. c.Jumping beans - everyone jumps d.Baked beans - eveyone runs away.
